revised_title: Yang-Mills Theory in the Temporal Gauge: A Functional Power Series Approach
tldr: The author explores Yang-Mills theory in the temporal gauge using a functional power series approach. They derive a set of partial differential equations equivalent to the gauge constraint equation and solve them explicitly for the first two orders in 2+1 dimensions. The analysis provides insights into the form of the wave functional forced by the gauge constraint equation and examines a conjecture made by Feynman for the ground state in 2+1 dimensions.
